description:
Learn how to play and sing almost every song which you like on acoustic guitar just for a few days.

From absolute beginner, you'll be able to play your first song in good quality very soon.

Through this course of 15 lessons and ~40 min of content, you’ll learn enough and strong basic for learning every song that you really like.


Guaranteed result

You will be performing your first song on the acoustic guitar, in a bardic manner (singing and playing chords together), by heart, without even looking at the fret board.

What you need to do

For success, you need just to watch lessons, do simple exercises — from one simple skill to another.

And in the end you'll get your strong understanding of how to learn every song, skills to play simple songs and the own cover version on the popular song.

Your first song will be taken from best of British rock hits, from a famous band and will be the most suitable for studying.

Then after achieving this first goal, you can go further and do the same thing with all the songs you like.

If you go through each step of the course, you will achieve your goal, otherwise you will receive your money back.
title: Learn to play guitar: 15 steps to play your first song
